title: Vogel's PHW 100 M TV mount/stand Black
description:
Vogel's PHW 100 M TV mount/stand Black


Enjoy your LCD/Plasma TV mounted (very) flat to the wall, and free up space. The FLAT MEDIUM wall mount from Physix is suitable for TV's from 26'' to 37'' weighing up to 30 kg. This universal support is suitable for almost all LCD/Plasma TV brands (use our MOUNT MATCHER to find exactly the right mount size for your TV). It comes with easy mounting instructions, as well as all the screws and wall plugs you might need. The Lock Release feature clicks your TV to the wall, and ensures a secure & safe connection between the TV and the wall mount.


Key Specifications:
- **Other features**: Screen size compatibility: 37
- **Design**: Product colour: Black; Housing material: Aluminium, Plastic
- **Mounting**: Mounting type: Wall; Maximum weight capacity: 30 kg

title: Hama 00118083 TV mount/stand 165.1 cm (65") Black, White
description:
Hama 00118083 TV mount/stand 165.1 cm (65") Black, White


Sofa, bed, kitchen or floor - thanks to this wall bracket you can move your flat screen TV in any position. It perfectly blends in with almost any home design so that you are guaranteed to enjoy watching TV. - Easy-Fix system for simple and fully adjustable orientation of your TV - The drilling template means easy marking of the drill holes without having to hold the bracket up against the wall - If the TV bracket has been mounted slightly at an angle on the wall, the position of the TV can be corrected by a few degrees horizontally - Make a safe choice with our tested safety and 10-year warranty: exacting stress, stability and functional tests guarantee high quality standards - Everything included: with the diverse mounting accessories, including high-quality Fischer plugs, you can get started straight away - Perfectly matched to the background: This TV wall bracket with wall plate and support arms in white and TV mounting plate in black matches the room design and TV colour


Key Specifications:
- **Weight & dimensions**: Width: 430 mm; Height: 418 mm
- **Design**: Product colour: Black, White; Housing material: Steel
- **Ergonomics**: Tilt angle range: -15 - 15°; Swivel angle: 180°; Angle of rotation: 6°; Distance to the wall (max): 42.5 cm; Distance to the wall (min): 9 cm
- **Mounting**: Number of displays supported: 1; Maximum screen size: 165.1 cm (65"); Mounting type: Wall; Maximum weight capacity: 35 kg; Minimum VESA mount: 100 x 100 mm; Maximum VESA mount: 400 x 400 mm; Minimum screen size: 81.3 cm (32"); Panel mounting interface: 100 x 100,100 x 150,100 x 200,200 x 100,200 x 200,200 x 300,300 x 100,300 x 200,300 x 400,300 x 300,400 x 200,400 x 400,400 x 300

title: ARCTIC TV Flex M Flat Full-Motion TV Wall Mount for medium sized TVs
description:
ARCTIC TV Flex M Flat Full-Motion TV Wall Mount for medium sized TVs


The TV Flex M full-motion wall mount enhances the viewing capabilities of flatscreen TVs. Strong, safe, and fully articulated – maximum flexibility makes it easy to find the perfect screen position. High quality steel construction with a lock system stably and securely supports screens from 23”– 55”, up to 30 kg, and is suitable for nearly all VESA standard flat screen TVs. Whether flush against the wall or extended to almost 50 cm, the TV and bracket fit seamlessly into any interior design style.


Key Specifications:
- **Logistics data**: Harmonized System (HS) code: 85299097
- **Weight & dimensions**: Weight: 3.9 kg
- **Packaging content**: Number of washers included: 7; Number of screws: 19
- **Design**: Product colour: Black; Housing material: Aluminium, Steel; Certification: CE
- **Ergonomics**: Tilt angle range: -15 - 15°; Swivel angle: 180°; Angle of rotation: 360°; Distance to the wall (max): 49.8 cm; Distance to the wall (min): 4.1 cm
- **Mounting**: Number of displays supported: 1; Maximum screen size: 139.7 cm (55"); Mounting type: Wall; Maximum weight capacity: 30 kg; Minimum VESA mount: 50 x 50 mm; Maximum VESA mount: 400 x 400 mm; Minimum screen size: 58.4 cm (23"); Panel mounting interface: 50 x 50,75 x 75,100 x 100,200 x 100,200 x 200,300 x 300,400 x 200,400 x 400

title: Chief MWR6045B TV mount/stand Black
description:
Chief MWR6045B TV mount/stand Black


Provides extended viewing angles for flat panel TVs and monitors. - Easily installs on 16" center studs - Provides full extension while remaining low profile in the home position - Centris Technolgoy provides fingertip tilt adjustments - CableTrac System provides a fast and effective way to route cables - Swivel up to 90° left or right (depending upon screen size) - Integrated lateral shift 6" left and right (ships shifted 2.5" to the left) - Mounting guides provided for a hassle-free installation - Q-Latch Mounting System secures flat panel to mount with a latching flag - Screen can be installed in portrait or landscape orientation


Key Specifications:
- **Other features**: Screen size compatibility: 762 - 1397 mm (30 - 55")
- **Weight & dimensions**: Width: 600 mm; Depth: 86 mm; Height: 457 mm
- **Design**: Product colour: Black; Housing material: Metal
- **Ergonomics**: Tilt angle range: -15 - 5°; Swivel angle range: 0 - 90°
- **Mounting**: Mounting type: Wall; Maximum weight capacity: 57 kg

title: Chief PWR2540S TV mount/stand Black
description:
Chief PWR2540S TV mount/stand Black


Allows for viewing flexibility when installing a flat panel TV or monitor. A great choice for corporate and home entertainment applications. - Extends 24.88" from wall and remains low profile in the home position - Q-Latch Mounting System secures flat panel to mount with a latching flag - Integrated lateral shift 6" left and right (ships shifted 2.5" to the left) - Centris Technology provides fingertip tilt adjustments - Mounting guides provided for a hassle-free installation - Provides positive latch in home position to keep screen tight to wall - CableTrac System provides a fast and effective way to route cables - UL listed for proven strength - Swivel up to 90° left or right (depending upon screen size)

title: Chief PIWRF2000B TV mount/stand 180.3 cm (71") Black
description:
Chief PIWRF2000B TV mount/stand 180.3 cm (71") Black


- Limitless centering on the wall between 16" center studs without cutting studs - Low profile design ensures the mount remains concealed behind the flat panel - Centris Technology uses the center of gravity to achieve smooth, fingertip tilt - ClickConnect Technology provides an audible click to confirm the flat panel is locked in place - Easy connect/disconnect with no tools needed - Screen can be installed in portrait or landscape orientation ( PAC400 accessory can be used to rotate without removing the screen) - Integrated cable management
